We may also ask you to provide a writing sample or code sample, and to complete a case study. Depending on the role, your process may differ slightly. Return The specifics of your interviews—the number of people you meet with, and for how long—depend on which role you’ve applied to, but we’ll be mindful of your time. If applying for more than one role, you should anticipate potentially interviewing with multiple groups of interviewers. Please let us know if you have any scheduling considerations, time constraints, or deadlines from other processes. Phone Interviews Find a quiet location with good reception. Please let your interviewer know if you’re having difficulty hearing them. Virtual Interviews Please be a few minutes early so you have time to settle in. Technical glitches can happen; we encourage you to test your setup ahead of time, but don’t hesitate to let your interviewer know if you’re having any difficulties connecting. Wear what makes you comfortable. We don’t have a dress code for interviewees (or employees). Tip: Consider having something nearby to take notes on during your conversations. Internships As an intern, you’ll focus on some of the most challenging and interesting problems in finance and technology, while learning from experienced managers, tailored educational programming, and distinguished guest speakers. You’ll also share in community-building social events with fellow interns and employees.     3 videos Our Internships and Interview Process: Our Application Management System is offline for scheduled maintenance. We encourage you to check back soon. I am a student interested in at your offices. 4 of 16 Internships No internships available for your search, please try something else. Please visit our D. E. Shaw India website for internships in India. Corporate Development Corporate Development Investment Analysis Investment Analysis Investor Relations Legal & Compliance Quantitative Strategies Quantitative Strategies Software Development Software Development Technology Technology Technology Trading Please visit our D. E. Shaw India website for internships in India. Real-World Problems Weeks in Length Competitive Pay Support Is this Internship for Me? (Yes!) We encourage undergraduate and graduate students from all academic disciplines, schools, and class years to apply, though most of our interns join us the summer before they graduate. If you haven’t previously considered finance as a career, that’s great! Though it’s also great if you have. We’re more interested in talent, curiosity, and analytical thinking than in any particular skill or experience, and we’re excited to see how you’ve demonstrated initiative and what you’ve achieved. If you thrive in a principled, collaborative, and intellectually curious environment, you should feel at home with us. Most of our interns work in our New York City headquarters. Others work in Denver, London, Hong Kong, Shanghai, and Singapore (when you apply, you can state your office interest). We provide housing support to interns. Summer internships typically run from June to August. We consider applications on a rolling basis to accommodate a range of recruiting timelines and student obligations. That said, as we typically complete the selection of our intern class early in the first quarter of the internship year, we recommend applying for 2025 internships by year-end 2024. Please contact us if you have any questions. Most of our interns work in our New York City headquarters. Others work in Denver, London, Hong Kong, Shanghai, and Singapore (when you apply, you can state your office interest). We provide housing support to interns. Summer internships typically run from June to August. We consider applications on a rolling basis to accommodate a range of recruiting timelines and student obligations. That said, as we typically complete the selection of our intern class early in the first quarter of the internship year, we recommend applying for 2025 internships by year-end 2024. Please contact us if you have any questions. Since 2016, we’ve hosted a set of unique educational opportunities aiming to bring together talented and intellectually curious students and provide them with exposure to what we do at the D. E. Shaw group. The fellowships include an introduction to our firm, insights into our rigorous approach to finance and technology, and several professional and social networking opportunities. Students attending U.S. colleges and universities from all academic disciplines, including those without a background in finance, are welcome to apply. Below is a sampling of fellowships we host; for the most up-to-date information on our programs, please visit our fellowship website.     1 video Our Fellowships: Discovery Latitude Momentum Nexus     To explore career opportunities and to apply for positions within the firm, please visit our job openings.     An actual human will review your application. If we think there might be a good match between your background and our needs, we’ll schedule a phone interview. If we find a mutual interest, one or more virtual interviews would follow.     We apologize for any difficulties you encountered while trying to apply. Our application form works in Chrome, Firefox, Edge, and Safari, so please try to access the form through one of those browsers. If all else fails, please feel free to send your resume to E-Mail schreiben. Be sure to specify the position(s) for which you would like to be considered, and we may follow up to request additional information that would have been included on the application form.     Be sure to fill out each of the required fields in this section. Our recruiting practices are based on the collection of a wide range of information about each candidate, but you may skip any portion of the form that clearly does not apply to your case.     At the D. E. Shaw group, we value clear and concise written communication. We’re interested in seeing how you write: your sample can be for work, school, or fun, and could include an essay, article, proposal, legal brief, term paper, or (for relevant roles) technical writing. The sample should be an expository piece of work written in English, several pages in length (but no longer than 15 pages; an excerpt from a larger work is welcome), and entirely your own work, unedited by anyone else. Please don’t send cover letters, resumes, creative writing (i.e., fiction), or statements of purpose as your writing sample. You’re welcome to improve the piece yourself if it’s been a few years since you wrote it—we’d love to see something you’re particularly proud of!     Yes, you can apply for multiple positions through our job openings. We will also consider your application for any other positions we deem relevant to your background and experience, regardless of the positions in which you’ve expressed interest on your application.       We have a hybrid work schedule, with most employees coming into the office three days a week.BewerbenJob merkenDiesen Job meldenWeitere relevante JobsuchenPraktikum | Fachangestellter Gesundheit | Kleinkinderzieher | Pflege | Marketing | Assistent Marketing | Assistentin Marketing | Aushilfe | Berufsbildungsverantwortliche | Betagtenbetreuer | Erwachsenenbildner | FaBe | Hauspflegerin | Hebamme | IndesignKategorien:Administration / HR / Consulting / CEO, Sachbearbeitung / Sprachübersetzung"

E. Shaw group is a home for curious minds. We have high ethical standards and enjoy solving difficult problems. Joining our team means you’ll work with a creative, socially conscious, and (occasionally) nerdy set of individuals. We thrive on diversity—in life experiences, fields of study, and ways of thinking (to name just a few). Click here to apply. We welcome exceptional applicants from all backgrounds. To ensure that our curious staff never stop learning, we offer onsite and online courses to aid in professional development, we utilize a supportive mentorship system, and we bring in leading thinkers from academia and industry to discuss everything from space exploration to the physics of cooking. We also curate a Technical Speaker series dedicated to computing, economics, machine learning, and statistics. Our goal is to give all of our staff the opportunity to grow through challenging work, friendly colleagues, and a culture of continuous learning. "Text" : "Quantitative Analyst, Ph.D. Intern (New York) – Summer 2025ETH get hiredBewerbenJob merkenVeröffentlicht:20 August 2024Pensum:100%Arbeitsort:USA / KanadaQuantitative Analyst, Ph.D. Intern (New York) – Summer 2025The D. E. Shaw group is a home for curious minds. We have high ethical standards and enjoy solving difficult problems. Joining our team means you’ll work with a creative, socially conscious, and (occasionally) nerdy set of individuals. We thrive on diversity—in life experiences, fields of study, and ways of thinking (to name just a few). Click here to apply. We welcome exceptional applicants from all backgrounds. To ensure that our curious staff never stop learning, we offer onsite and online courses to aid in professional development, we utilize a supportive mentorship system, and we bring in leading thinkers from academia and industry to discuss everything from space exploration to the physics of cooking. We also curate a Technical Speaker series dedicated to computing, economics, machine learning, and statistics. Our goal is to give all of our staff the opportunity to grow through challenging work, friendly colleagues, and a culture of continuous learning. Our Application Management System is offline for scheduled maintenance. We encourage you to check back soon. I am a interested in at your offices. Viewing 4 of 9 Jobs Add Job to your application bundle No jobs available for your search, please try something else. Please visit our D. E. Shaw India website for jobs in India. Corporate Development Corporate Development Corporate Development Quantitative Strategies Quantitative Strategies Technology Various Please visit our D. E. Shaw India website for jobs in India. Interviewing is important to our hiring process. As we get to know you better, you’ll get the chance to know our firm better, too. Compelling candidates tend to:     1 video Interviewing with Us: If you want to learn more about our approach to interviewing, our guide to preparing for an interview can help you put your best foot forward. A successful hiring process often includes an application review, a phone interview and virtual interviews, conversations with your references, and, finally, an offer. We may also ask you to provide a writing sample or code sample, and to complete a case study. Depending on the role, your process may differ slightly. Return The specifics of your interviews—the number of people you meet with, and for how long—depend on which role you’ve applied to, but we’ll be mindful of your time. If applying for more than one role, you should anticipate potentially interviewing with multiple groups of interviewers. Please let us know if you have any scheduling considerations, time constraints, or deadlines from other processes. Phone Interviews Find a quiet location with good reception. Please let your interviewer know if you’re having difficulty hearing them. Virtual Interviews Please be a few minutes early so you have time to settle in. Technical glitches can happen; we encourage you to test your setup ahead of time, but don’t hesitate to let your interviewer know if you’re having any difficulties connecting. Wear what makes you comfortable. We don’t have a dress code for interviewees (or employees). Tip: Consider having something nearby to take notes on during your conversations. Internships As an intern, you’ll focus on some of the most challenging and interesting problems in finance and technology, while learning from experienced managers, tailored educational programming, and distinguished guest speakers. You’ll also share in community-building social events with fellow interns and employees.     3 videos Our Internships and Interview Process: Our Application Management System is offline for scheduled maintenance. We encourage you to check back soon. I am a student interested in at your offices. 4 of 16 Internships No internships available for your search, please try something else. Please visit our D. E. Shaw India website for internships in India. Corporate Development Corporate Development Investment Analysis Investment Analysis Investor Relations Legal & Compliance Quantitative Strategies Quantitative Strategies Software Development Software Development Technology Technology Technology Trading Please visit our D. E. Shaw India website for internships in India. Real-World Problems Weeks in Length Competitive Pay Support Is this Internship for Me? (Yes!) We encourage undergraduate and graduate students from all academic disciplines, schools, and class years to apply, though most of our interns join us the summer before they graduate. If you haven’t previously considered finance as a career, that’s great! Though it’s also great if you have. We’re more interested in talent, curiosity, and analytical thinking than in any particular skill or experience, and we’re excited to see how you’ve demonstrated initiative and what you’ve achieved. If you thrive in a principled, collaborative, and intellectually curious environment, you should feel at home with us. Most of our interns work in our New York City headquarters. Others work in Denver, London, Hong Kong, Shanghai, and Singapore (when you apply, you can state your office interest). We provide housing support to interns. Summer internships typically run from June to August. We consider applications on a rolling basis to accommodate a range of recruiting timelines and student obligations. That said, as we typically complete the selection of our intern class early in the first quarter of the internship year, we recommend applying for 2025 internships by year-end 2024. Please contact us if you have any questions. Most of our interns work in our New York City headquarters. Others work in Denver, London, Hong Kong, Shanghai, and Singapore (when you apply, you can state your office interest). We provide housing support to interns. Summer internships typically run from June to August. We consider applications on a rolling basis to accommodate a range of recruiting timelines and student obligations. That said, as we typically complete the selection of our intern class early in the first quarter of the internship year, we recommend applying for 2025 internships by year-end 2024. Please contact us if you have any questions. Since 2016, we’ve hosted a set of unique educational opportunities aiming to bring together talented and intellectually curious students and provide them with exposure to what we do at the D. E. Shaw group. The fellowships include an introduction to our firm, insights into our rigorous approach to finance and technology, and several professional and social networking opportunities. Students attending U.S. colleges and universities from all academic disciplines, including those without a background in finance, are welcome to apply. Below is a sampling of fellowships we host; for the most up-to-date information on our programs, please visit our fellowship website.     1 video Our Fellowships: Discovery Latitude Momentum Nexus     To explore career opportunities and to apply for positions within the firm, please visit our job openings.     An actual human will review your application. If we think there might be a good match between your background and our needs, we’ll schedule a phone interview. If we find a mutual interest, one or more virtual interviews would follow.     We apologize for any difficulties you encountered while trying to apply. Our application form works in Chrome, Firefox, Edge, and Safari, so please try to access the form through one of those browsers. If all else fails, please feel free to send your resume to E-Mail schreiben. Be sure to specify the position(s) for which you would like to be considered, and we may follow up to request additional information that would have been included on the application form.     Be sure to fill out each of the required fields in this section. Our recruiting practices are based on the collection of a wide range of information about each candidate, but you may skip any portion of the form that clearly does not apply to your case.     At the D. E. Shaw group, we value clear and concise written communication. We’re interested in seeing how you write: your sample can be for work, school, or fun, and could include an essay, article, proposal, legal brief, term paper, or (for relevant roles) technical writing. The sample should be an expository piece of work written in English, several pages in length (but no longer than 15 pages; an excerpt from a larger work is welcome), and entirely your own work, unedited by anyone else. Please don’t send cover letters, resumes, creative writing (i.e., fiction), or statements of purpose as your writing sample. You’re welcome to improve the piece yourself if it’s been a few years since you wrote it—we’d love to see something you’re particularly proud of!     Yes, you can apply for multiple positions through our job openings. We will also consider your application for any other positions we deem relevant to your background and experience, regardless of the positions in which you’ve expressed interest on your application.       We have a hybrid work schedule, with most employees coming into the office three days a week.BewerbenJob merkenDiesen Job meldenWeitere relevante JobsuchenM & A Analyst | Junior Analyst | Produkt Analyst | Analyse von Daten | IT Analyse | Analyse | Data Mining | Datenanalyse-Spezialist | Quantitative Methoden | quant analyst | Quantitative Analyse | Digital Analyst | Unternehmensanalyse | Prozess-Analyse | DatenanalytikKategorien:Banking / Versicherungswesen, Finanz-/Business Analyse"

E. Shaw group is a home for curious minds. We have high ethical standards and enjoy solving difficult problems. Joining our team means you’ll work with a creative, socially conscious, and (occasionally) nerdy set of individuals. We thrive on diversity—in life experiences, fields of study, and ways of thinking (to name just a few). Click here to apply. We welcome exceptional applicants from all backgrounds. To ensure that our curious staff never stop learning, we offer onsite and online courses to aid in professional development, we utilize a supportive mentorship system, and we bring in leading thinkers from academia and industry to discuss everything from space exploration to the physics of cooking. We also curate a Technical Speaker series dedicated to computing, economics, machine learning, and statistics. Our goal is to give all of our staff the opportunity to grow through challenging work, friendly colleagues, and a culture of continuous learning. Our Application Management System is offline for scheduled maintenance. We encourage you to check back soon. I am a interested in at your offices. Viewing 4 of 9 Jobs Add Job to your application bundle No jobs available for your search, please try something else. Please visit our D. E. Shaw India website for jobs in India. Corporate Development Corporate Development Corporate Development Quantitative Strategies Quantitative Strategies Technology Various Please visit our D. E. Shaw India website for jobs in India. Interviewing is important to our hiring process. As we get to know you better, you’ll get the chance to know our firm better, too. Compelling candidates tend to:     1 video Interviewing with Us: If you want to learn more about our approach to interviewing, our guide to preparing for an interview can help you put your best foot forward. A successful hiring process often includes an application review, a phone interview and virtual interviews, conversations with your references, and, finally, an offer. We may also ask you to provide a writing sample or code sample, and to complete a case study. Depending on the role, your process may differ slightly. Return The specifics of your interviews—the number of people you meet with, and for how long—depend on which role you’ve applied to, but we’ll be mindful of your time. If applying for more than one role, you should anticipate potentially interviewing with multiple groups of interviewers. Please let us know if you have any scheduling considerations, time constraints, or deadlines from other processes. Phone Interviews Find a quiet location with good reception. Please let your interviewer know if you’re having difficulty hearing them. Virtual Interviews Please be a few minutes early so you have time to settle in. Technical glitches can happen; we encourage you to test your setup ahead of time, but don’t hesitate to let your interviewer know if you’re having any difficulties connecting. Wear what makes you comfortable. We don’t have a dress code for interviewees (or employees). Tip: Consider having something nearby to take notes on during your conversations. Internships As an intern, you’ll focus on some of the most challenging and interesting problems in finance and technology, while learning from experienced managers, tailored educational programming, and distinguished guest speakers. You’ll also share in community-building social events with fellow interns and employees.     3 videos Our Internships and Interview Process: Our Application Management System is offline for scheduled maintenance. We encourage you to check back soon. I am a student interested in at your offices. 4 of 16 Internships No internships available for your search, please try something else. Please visit our D. E. We encourage undergraduate and graduate students from all academic disciplines, schools, and class years to apply, though most of our interns join us the summer before they graduate. If you haven’t previously considered finance as a career, that’s great! Though it’s also great if you have. We’re more interested in talent, curiosity, and analytical thinking than in any particular skill or experience, and we’re excited to see how you’ve demonstrated initiative and what you’ve achieved. If you thrive in a principled, collaborative, and intellectually curious environment, you should feel at home with us. Most of our interns work in our New York City headquarters. Others work in Denver, London, Hong Kong, Shanghai, and Singapore (when you apply, you can state your office interest). We provide housing support to interns. Summer internships typically run from June to August. We consider applications on a rolling basis to accommodate a range of recruiting timelines and student obligations. That said, as we typically complete the selection of our intern class early in the first quarter of the internship year, we recommend applying for 2025 internships by year-end 2024. An actual human will review your application. If we think there might be a good match between your background and our needs, we’ll schedule a phone interview. If we find a mutual interest, one or more virtual interviews would follow.     We apologize for any difficulties you encountered while trying to apply. Our application form works in Chrome, Firefox, Edge, and Safari, so please try to access the form through one of those browsers. If all else fails, please feel free to send your resume to E-Mail schreiben. Be sure to specify the position(s) for which you would like to be considered, and we may follow up to request additional information that would have been included on the application form.     Be sure to fill out each of the required fields in this section. Our recruiting practices are based on the collection of a wide range of information about each candidate, but you may skip any portion of the form that clearly does not apply to your case.     At the D. E. Shaw group, we value clear and concise written communication. We’re interested in seeing how you write: your sample can be for work, school, or fun, and could include an essay, article, proposal, legal brief, term paper, or (for relevant roles) technical writing. The sample should be an expository piece of work written in English, several pages in length (but no longer than 15 pages; an excerpt from a larger work is welcome), and entirely your own work, unedited by anyone else. Please don’t send cover letters, resumes, creative writing (i.e., fiction), or statements of purpose as your writing sample. You’re welcome to improve the piece yourself if it’s been a few years since you wrote it—we’d love to see something you’re particularly proud of!     Yes, you can apply for multiple positions through our job openings. We will also consider your application for any other positions we deem relevant to your background and experience, regardless of the positions in which you’ve expressed interest on your application. Shaw group. The fellowships include an introduction to our firm, insights into our rigorous approach to finance and technology, and several professional and social networking opportunities. Students attending U.S. colleges and universities from all academic disciplines, including those without a background in finance, are welcome to apply. Below is a sampling of fellowships we host; for the most up-to-date information on our programs, please visit our fellowship website.     1 video Our Fellowships: Discovery Latitude Momentum Nexus     To explore career opportunities and to apply for positions within the firm, please visit our job openings.     An actual human will review your application. If we think there might be a good match between your background and our needs, we’ll schedule a phone interview. If we find a mutual interest, one or more virtual interviews would follow.     We apologize for any difficulties you encountered while trying to apply. Our application form works in Chrome, Firefox, Edge, and Safari, so please try to access the form through one of those browsers. If all else fails, please feel free to send your resume to E-Mail schreiben. Be sure to specify the position(s) for which you would like to be considered, and we may follow up to request additional information that would have been included on the application form.     Be sure to fill out each of the required fields in this section. Our recruiting practices are based on the collection of a wide range of information about each candidate, but you may skip any portion of the form that clearly does not apply to your case.     At the D. E. Shaw group, we value clear and concise written communication. We’re interested in seeing how you write: your sample can be for work, school, or fun, and could include an essay, article, proposal, legal brief, term paper, or (for relevant roles) technical writing. The sample should be an expository piece of work written in English, several pages in length (but no longer than 15 pages; an excerpt from a larger work is welcome), and entirely your own work, unedited by anyone else. Please don’t send cover letters, resumes, creative writing (i.e., fiction), or statements of purpose as your writing sample. You’re welcome to improve the piece yourself if it’s been a few years since you wrote it—we’d love to see something you’re particularly proud of!     Yes, you can apply for multiple positions through our job openings. We will also consider your application for any other positions we deem relevant to your background and experience, regardless of the positions in which you’ve expressed interest on your application.       We have a hybrid work schedule, with most employees coming into the office three days a week.BewerbenJob merkenDiesen Job meldenWeitere relevante JobsuchenASP.NET | C | C++ Entwickler | .NET Anwendungsentwickler | Softwareentwicklung | .NET | .NET Entwickler | C Entwickler | Informatik | Applikation Engineer | App | .NET-Applikationsentwicklung | Applikations-Entwickler | Entwickler | HTML EntwicklerKategorien:Informatik / Telekommunikation, Software Architektur / Engineering"

Shaw group is a home for curious minds. We have high ethical standards and enjoy solving difficult problems. Joining our team means you’ll work with a creative, socially conscious, and (occasionally) nerdy set of individuals. We thrive on diversity—in life experiences, fields of study, and ways of thinking (to name just a few). Click here to apply. We welcome exceptional applicants from all backgrounds. To ensure that our curious staff never stop learning, we offer onsite and online courses to aid in professional development, we utilize a supportive mentorship system, and we bring in leading thinkers from academia and industry to discuss everything from space exploration to the physics of cooking. We also curate a Technical Speaker series dedicated to computing, economics, machine learning, and statistics. Our goal is to give all of our staff the opportunity to grow through challenging work, friendly colleagues, and a culture of continuous learning. A successful hiring process often includes an application review, a phone interview and virtual interviews, conversations with your references, and, finally, an offer. We may also ask you to provide a writing sample or code sample, and to complete a case study. Depending on the role, your process may differ slightly. Return The specifics of your interviews—the number of people you meet with, and for how long—depend on which role you’ve applied to, but we’ll be mindful of your time. If applying for more than one role, you should anticipate potentially interviewing with multiple groups of interviewers. Please let us know if you have any scheduling considerations, time constraints, or deadlines from other processes. Phone Interviews Find a quiet location with good reception. Please let your interviewer know if you’re having difficulty hearing them. Virtual Interviews Please be a few minutes early so you have time to settle in. Technical glitches can happen; we encourage you to test your setup ahead of time, but don’t hesitate to let your interviewer know if you’re having any difficulties connecting. Wear what makes you comfortable. We don’t have a dress code for interviewees (or employees). Tip: Consider having something nearby to take notes on during your conversations. "ID" : "3739d859-5697-4cff-98ab-e1cba8951d4b"
"Job Title" : "HSO International"
"Company" : "HSO Enterprise Solutions AG"
"Veröffentlicht" : "11 Juli 2024"

"Text" : "HSO International - Solution Architect -Dynamics 365 for Finance and Operations.HSO Enterprise Solutions AGBewerbenJob merkenVeröffentlicht:11 Juli 2024Pensum:100%Vertrag:FestanstellungArbeitsort:WinterthurHSO International - Solution Architect -Dynamics 365 for Finance and Operations.Life at HSO Role introduction About HSO International Our dedicated team of professionals at HSO International is committed to driving business transformations for multinational organisations using cutting-edge Microsoft technology. We specialise in working with leading Retail, Distribution, Manufacturing, and Professional Services brands. At HSO International, we take pride in our diverse team of 300 professionals representing over 35 nationalities. This unique blend of cultures and perspectives is key to our success in transforming multinationals and deploying Microsoft Tech in over 45 countries. Discover more about Life at HSO International by visiting https://www.hso.com/en/campaigns/life-at-hso-international About the role Joining HSO International as a Solution Architect means ensuring solution integrity for implementation projects involving Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations, coordinating consultant teams, and providing invaluable advice to customers regarding business system design and implementation. Your role will also include contributing to the development of HSO best practices and active participation in presales activities. Role location This position allows for flexibility regarding location within Europe, provided the candidate possesses full European or UK working rights. As our global projects may require travel and on-site work, candidates should be willing to work at home or on the customer's site or the HSO office as needed. For the right candidate, HSO International is ready to facilitate relocation to the Netherlands and provide a work visa, presenting an exceptional opportunity for personal and professional growth. Qualifications Qualifications experience  University degree preferably in Supply Chain Management, Logistics, Economics, Business Administration, Production Engineering and Management, Management, Computer Science, Information Science or comparable education. At least 7 to 10+ years of ERP consulting experience – preferably with Microsoft Dynamics 365 F&O or earlier versions of Dynamics AX. Experience with several end-to-end ERP implementations. Broad and in-depth knowledge of Dynamics 365 for Finance and Operations. Ability to operate most modules. Experience with Power Platform, good awareness of Microsoft Azure automation capabilities, data analytics and other areas of technology accompanying business system implementation. Ability to lead a team of functional consultants in implementation projects. Experience in running presales diagnostic projects. Strong formal and technical writing skills – quickly producing high-quality documents. Strong command of written and spoken English. Ability to communicate with customers on different levels of the organisation.  Personal Characteristics  Strong analytical skills. Effective communication. Affable nature. Genuine interest in technology. Effective leadership through knowledge, experience, and example. Entrepreneurial mindset. Ability to collaborate within a team. Aptitude for working in a non-hierarchical, cooperative and friendly team environment.  Benefits & about HSO A generous compensation package  You will receive a competitive salary and comprehensive benefits, including a leased car, laptop, and mobile phone.  Autonomy and accountability  You will have ample freedom and flexibility to structure your work days and, most importantly, shape your career path.  LI-CH1 LI-REMOTE Apply now! Fill out the form below, include your resume and we will get in touch with you shortly. HSO International - Microsoft D365 Project Manager Work across the globeThe businessFounded in 1989, HSO specialises in implementing, integrating, optimising and maintaining enterprise solutions based on Microsoft Dynamics 365, Microsoft Dynamics AX, Microsoft Dynamics CRM and Microsoft Office 365 with a focus on multinational enterprises in industries such as Distribution, Retail, Manufacturing and Services (Construction, O&G, Professional Services, Field Service, Equipment Rental).Leading Microsoft PartnerHSO belongs to the elite Microsoft Dynamics Inner Circle, restricted to the top 1% of all Microsoft partners worldwide, and has delivered successful implementations in almost every country. Today the business employs c. 1.000 professionals and maintains a worldwide presence in Europe, North America and Asia.HSO InternationalIn response to the need for multinational customers to ensure control and consistency in the rollout of their projects, HSO has established an international business unit - HSO International – a team of 200+ which acts as a link between the local HSO country offices, the HSO Alliance partners and customers to minimise risk and to ensure an efficient and consistent approach to international projects. (N.B. HSO uses its Excellerate methodology in combination with its Gartner-recommended Kernel-Rollout approach to ensure that simultaneous multi-country projects can be managed with minimal risk, increased efficiency, and predictable results).Learn more about Life at HSO International: https://www.hso.com/en/campaigns/life-at-hso-international/Reason for vacancyAs the digital transformation revolution gathers pace, there is a growing need to provide our customers with capabilities beyond the knowledge of ERP and its traditional implementation approach.Who should apply for this role?Only candidates with 4 + years of hands-on software implementation experience with Microsoft ERP Solutions.Job PurposeResponsible for the successful delivery of projects, ensuring: A quality delivery across all customer engagements Achievement of profitable services performance High customer satisfaction levels on implementation Achievement of crucial project objectives Motivation of individual members of the project delivery team Lead the planning and implementation of projects Facilitate the definition of project scope, risks, goals and deliverables Define project tasks and resource requirements Develop full-scale project plans Assemble and coordinate project staff Manage project budget Manage project resource allocation Track project deliverables and issues using appropriate tools Provide direction and support to the project team Quality assurance Constantly monitor and report on the progress of the projects to all stakeholders Present reports defining project progress, problems and solutions Implement and manage project changes and interventions to achieve project outputs Project evaluations and assessment of the result Ensure HSO Project Methodology is fully documented, used in all relevant pieces of work and understood and used by all the Consultants on the project HSO International - Enterprise Architect - Professional Services Enterprise Architect HSO International is expanding its Professional Services industry footprint. The business employs c. 2,300 professionals and maintains a worldwide presence in Europe, North America and Asia.HSO InternationalWith 230 + colleagues at HSO International, you are a point of contact for companies that understand the big picture and oversee issues of cross-border implementations. Travel will be extensive and varied. It will be a requirement to spend some time in the office to develop relationships in-house with the rest of HSO International, keep abreast of business developments, and understand the company’s approach to the market.Job DescriptionProfessional Services Enterprise Architect will be responsible for driving customer business transformation. This role involves: Presales – Engaging with customers early in the sales cycle to explain the art of the possible for Dynamics 365, Azure and associated technologies to help transform their business. Using workshops and envisioning sessions to understand strategy and high-level requirements, then using these to generate compelling business transformation demonstrations, architecture design and proposals. Experienced with responding to RFIs, RFPs and tender processes. Architecture Workshops – Leading and supporting the capability and architecture workshops within an envisioning phase. Includes the preparation for workshops with agendas and discovery materials review and the write-up of workshop output. Use business & product knowledge to guide on the appropriate solutions and approaches. Best practice materials creation – Work on the internal production of best practices. It covers tools, templates, and content, producing materials that deliver presales activities and EA phases. ProServ ISV – Work closely with the HSO Innovation team to help develop our product offering and position our ProServ IP solutions tailored for Legal (Legal360), Architecture, Engineering and Construction (AEC360) and consulting companies (Relationship360, Project360). Research and training - into new trends and solutions that become available through the Microsoft ecosystem or other associated 3rd party solutions. Examples are Open AI, Machine Learning, CoPilot and how these can be leveraged for Professional Services through the D365 landscape. Critical Responsibilities for Enterprise ArchitectIt would be best if you had strong communication, analytical, leadership, teamwork, and problem-solving skills to excel in this role. Your responsibilities include: Led and supporting pre-sales activities, engaging with C-level executives and crafting business transformation proposals aligned with the business strategy. Conducting envisioning discovery workshops and architecture design workshops. Making technology choices aligned with architectural requirements. Preparing and defining enterprise architecture design, guiding business transformation and business-value approach. Providing support in program/project delivery, working alongside Solution Architects and delivery teams. Developing and updating internal tools and best practice content. We use teamwork not just to meet challenges, but to also promote one another’s success.  2  Ever-Evolving We believe strongly in our values of always learning, always evolving and not standing still. HSO is dedicated to the ongoing professional development of people starting with the training and certification of our early career starters through to supporting senior experienced professionals.  3  Value Driven Our values and culture are attractive to people who want to work with value-driven teams around the world. Collaborating with colleagues and clients who are experts in their field provides an exceptional opportunity in your career to be continuously upskilling and expanding your knowledge and talent for accelerated learning and career progression.  4  Entrepreneurial At HSO we transform the way in which people work and how businesses operate to get results for our clients. This takes exceptional cutting-edge technology, knowledge, talent, determination and entrepreneurial spirit. "Text" : "Senior Finance Consultant Project OperationsHSO Enterprise Solutions AGBewerbenJob merkenVeröffentlicht:20 Februar 2024Pensum:100%Vertrag:FestanstellungArbeitsort:VeenendaalSenior Finance Consultant Project OperationsLife at HSO The Journey to Lead Program Find out how we coach and guide a group of leaders to become the next generation of managers. Léonie Havekes and Nathalie Boerefijn share what they’ve learned in their Journey to Lead. Wil je je kennis van financiële processen inzetten op uitdagende projecten? En zorg je voor een vlekkeloze implementatie van MS Dynamics 365F&O? Dan zoeken we jou! Introductie van de rol Als Senior Finance Consultant Professional Services sleutel je in wisselende projectteams aan het ontwerp, de realisatie en implementatie van Microsoft Dynamics 365 voor klanten in de Professional services industrie. Veel van onze projecten zijn zogenaamde platform projecten dit betekent dat we Dynamics 365 CE en Dynamics 365 FO integreren. Met jouw kennis zet je rock-solid oplossingen neer bij onze klanten, stuk voor stuk indrukwekkende spelers die jou een unieke inkijk geven in hun business. Wat ga je doen? Over het team Je bent onderdeel van de Service Line Unified Operations, een onderdeel van HSO Nederland. Unified Operations is een geoliede projectservices organisatie met een uitstekende reputatie op het gebied van ERP. Samen met de andere Servicelines binnen HSO kunnen we de complete Microsoft Stack aanbieden (Modern Workplace, AI, Data & Analytics, CE, Power Platform, Azure Integrations, e.d.). Het totale team van onze Service Line bestaat momenteel uit ruim 100 professionals, onder leiding van de Service Line Director Arie Martin van den Akker. Wat breng jij mee? Een goede beloning Werken bij HSO is uitdagend, we willen je daar graag een goede beloning voor teruggeven. Naast goede primaire voordelen bieden wij: Waarom HSO HSO is de eerste full-service Microsoft Partner in Nederland. Samen met ruim 2500 getalenteerde medewerkers in Europa, Azië en Noord-Amerika verlenen we ondersteuning op lokaal en internationaal niveau aan industriële bedrijven, retailers, financiële en zakelijke dienstverleners en overheidsinstellingen. HSO is voortdurend op zoek naar nieuw talent. We blijven onze wereldwijde community uitbreiden en scheppen er plezier in om samen te werken met prestatiegerichte mensen met een ondernemersgeest. Professionals die voortdurend willen leren en innoveren. Vrijheid, flexibiliteit en fun Je werkt in een internationale omgeving met professionals met verschillende nationaliteiten. Een flexibele werkweek van 40, 36 of 32 uur behoort tot de mogelijkheden omdat wij van mening zijn dat jouw manier van werken bij jouw levensstijl moet passen. HSO heeft professionals in dienst die plezier hebben in hun werk en klaar staan voor elkaar. Om het plezier in ons werk nog groter te maken, organiseren we uiteraard teamuitjes en bedrijfsfeesten, maar ook wekelijkse zomerborrels op ons dakterras, allerlei sportactiviteiten en is er de mogelijkheid bij te dragen aan onze Maatschappelijk Verantwoord Ondernemen-werkzaamheden. Solliciteren Enthousiast? Heb je vragen vooraf? Neem contact op met Shirley van Ast via E-Mail schreiben of 0610975050. LI-SA1 Apply now! Fill out the form below, include your resume and we will get in touch with you shortly. Life at HSO Find out how we coach and guide a group of leaders to become the next generation of managers. Léonie Havekes and Nathalie Boerefijn share what they’ve learned in their Journey to Lead. From India to Silicon Valley, and from Malta to Rotterdam: Siddharth and Divya Singh have lived all over the world and worked for the same employers. Together with their daughter, they have seen it all. How did the couple end up at HSO in the Netherlands? In this interview, they share their remarkable story. After graduating as an Industrial Engineer in Turkey, Hatice Aydin decided to pursue a career in IT and Business Applications. She was working on ERP projects and doing a master’s degree in software engineering. "It was at this time I realized I wanted to be involved in international and diverse projects while also gaining experience abroad. And so my path crossed with that of HSO International." Here is the story that brought me to HSO International’s Young Professionals Program (YPP). Related vacancies Beschik jij over vaardigheden om meerdere complexen tegelijkertijd te overzien, durf jij kritisch te zijn op processen en wil jij klanten helpen groeien door middel van succesvolle digitale innovatie? Dan komen wij graag in contact met jou! Join the Journey!Wat ga je doen?Je inspireert en adviseert onze klanten over de mogelijkheden voor de inzet van Azure & Integratie in bedrijfskritische en innovatieve projecten. Hierbij formuleer je een strategisch advies over de oplossing, de business value en de roadmap. Het gebruik van de modernste Microsoft technologieën zoals Azure Integration Services, Data & AI, maar ook Infra & Security staan daarbij centraal. Jij bent de onmisbare brug tussen de strategische doelstellingen van onze klant en de toegevoegde waarde van de digitale innovatie met behulp van Microsoft Azure.Je bent bij onze klanten verantwoordelijk voor de analyse en vertaling van business vraagstukken binnen het vakgebied en de begeleiding van Azure & Integratie trajecten bij klanten, zowel in de opstart- als realisatiefase. Je gaat je bezighouden met het uitdenken, opzetten en implementeren van oplossingen op basis van duidelijk bepaalde deliverables, strategische doelstellingen en afspraken met de klant. Daarnaast concentreer jij je op het leveren van een actieve bijdrage op het gebied van propositieontwikkeling en positionering van HSO in de markt.Azure & Integratie teamHet team bestaat uit ervaren Architecten, Cloud Developers, Integration Specialisten en andere Strategische Consultants. Kortom, een divers team met genoeg mogelijkheden om te groeien en genoeg collega's die altijd voor je klaar staan. Om je kennis te verbreden zijn er maandelijkse team meetings, expert sessies en is er alle ruimte voor het volgen van trainingen, conferenties en workshops.Wij werken bij onze klanten veel samen in multidisciplinaire teams. Dat zijn teams waarin we verschillende expertises vanuit HSO combineren voor onze klanten. Denk hierbij bijvoorbeeld aan Change Management, Data & AI en Infra & Security. Dit geeft jou de mogelijkheid om veel te leren van je collega’s en om jouw kennis met hen te delen.Naast complexe, uitdagende opdrachten zijn er uiteraard genoeg momenten voor leuke activiteiten met je collega’s. Borrels, events en kennissessies worden regelmatig georganiseerd, want naast werk moeten we natuurlijk niet vergeten te genieten! Daarnaast krijg je van ons alle ruimte tot ontwikkeling. Ben je klaar voor de stap naar Enterprise Level Cloud Native Development? Kom dan kennismaken bij HSOJoin the Journey!Wat ga je doen?Jij gaat je expertise inzetten binnen complexe projecten en houdt je bezig met de ontwikkeling van Cloud Solutions met Microsoft Azure technologieën. Je bent een ontwikkelaar bij de realisatie en automatisering van bedrijfskritische processen. Hierbij gebruik je altijd een combinatie van meerdere Azure-services. Ook draag je bij aan de GitHub-repository van waaruit wij onze klanten bedienen.Azure & Integration teamHet team bestaat uit ervaren architecten, consultants en andere Cloud Developers. Kortom, een divers team met genoeg mogelijkheden om te groeien en genoeg collega's die altijd voor je klaarstaan. Om je kennis te verbreden zijn er maandelijkse team meetings, expert sessies en is er alle ruimte voor het volgen van trainingen, conferenties en workshops. Wij werken bij onze klanten veel samen in multidisciplinaire teams. Dat zijn teams waarin we verschillende expertises vanuit HSO gecombineerd inzetten voor onze klanten. Denk hierbij bijvoorbeeld aan verandermanagement, User Centered Design en Data Engineering. Dit geeft jou de mogelijkheid om veel te leren van je collega’s en om jouw kennis met hen te delen. Ben je klaar voor de stap naar Enterprise Level Solution Architectuur? Kom dan kennismaken bij HSO!Join the Journey!Wat ga je doen?Als Azure Integration Architect begeleid jij klanten inhoudelijk in hun reis naar de Microsoft Cloud of bij het professionaliseren van de Cloud Competence. Je houdt je bezig met de (Hybride) Cloud Architectuur, het realiseren van een veilige Azure-omgeving en het moderniseren (Cloud Native) van applicaties, integraties en bijbehorende infrastructuren. Je inspireert organisaties en helpt met het nemen van beslissingen rondom migraties. Daarnaast geef je workshops over Cloud Architectuur, Integratie, Infrastructuur, Governance en Security & Compliance. Je bent gewend om in complexe omgevingen te werken en je weet lastige vraagstukken moeiteloos te vertalen naar technische oplossingen. Kortom, jouw hart klopt sneller van de Microsoft-technologie! Wil jij als Managed Services-meewerkstudent naast je opleiding dé ervaring opdoen die de rest van je carrière zal vormen? Ben jij een enthousiaste student die wel van uitdagingen houdt? Dan zoeken we jou!Introductie van de rolDe IT-wereld verandert in rap tempo en dit vraagt flexibiliteit en betrokkenheid. Jouw frisse kijk en energie kan ons hierbij helpen. Jij helpt ons om te zorgen voor een optimaal lopende dienstverlening binnen onze Managed Services afdeling. Dit doe je door middel van jouw kennis en vaardigheden die je vanuit je studie hebt verkregen met betrekking tot de onderwerpen cloud applications, business processes en modern workplace management.Wat ga je doen?Als Managed services -meewerkstudent word je betrokken bij de ondersteuning en uitvoering van diverse Managed services diensten zoals ‘Business Foundation’, ‘Business Continuity’ en ‘Platform Support Services’. Hierbij voer je samen met ervaren collega’s de ondersteunende taken uit die onder deze diensten vallen. Geen dag is hetzelfde binnen ons gezellige team! Door de contacten en vragen van onze klanten en de samenwerking met het Managed services team maken jouw werkzaamheden ontzettend gevarieerd en leerzaam. Door tevens zelf initiatief te nemen bepaal jij mede de richting van jouw werkzaamheden en sta jij zelf aan het roer van datgene waarin jij je wilt ontwikkelen!Over het teamBinnen HSO Nederland maak je deel uit van een Operations team dat valt onder de serviceline “Managed Services”. De service line is verantwoordelijk voor het leveren van alle gecontracteerde diensten die het HSO-portfolio te bieden heeft. Deze diensten worden door de Managed services klantenteams in samenwerking met de andere service-lines en ook HSO Global Services geleverd. Kortom een dynamische omgeving waarin jij een belangrijk onderdeel van bent.In totaal zijn er twee operationele teams en 5 klantenteams binnen Managed services. Elk klantenteam bestaat altijd minimaal uit een Customer Team Manager, Business Consultant, Lead Developer en een Customer Team Engineer tot ongeveer 10 collega’s. Jouw operationele team ondersteund alle klantenteams in het leveren van bovengenoemde diensten.Een greep uit je dagelijkse werkzaamheden: Uitvoeren van de operationele ITIL processen; Support telefoon dienst voor het aannemen van end-user calls ; Verwerken van end-user vragen die binnenkomen op de customer portal; Oplossen en beantwoorden van relatief eenvoudig IT gerelateerde vraagstukken; Uitvoeren van periodieke gedefinieerde werkinstructies; Oog voor te behalen KPI’s (Key Performance Indicators) per klant. Ben jij de ‘digital leader’ en ‘motivator’ voor de technische collega’s in het klantteam? En voel jij je verantwoordelijk voor de algehele kwaliteit en samenhang van het IT-landschap? Dan zoeken we jou!Introductie van de rol Als Technical Architect ben je eindverantwoordelijk voor de technische architectuur op de korte en lange termijn in projecten en sales trajecten. Je beschrijft en ontwikkelt de technische architectuur inclusief de integraties die daarbij komen kijken. Naast het ontwerpen van migratiescenario’s, onderhoud je ook contact met de technische en inhoudelijke stakeholders bij de klant en HSO.Als Technical Architect ben je de motivator voor de technische collega’s van het klantteam. Als digital leader naar de klant ben je in staat om breder te kijken dan de oplossing die wij leveren maar zie je deze in het totale end-to-end klantproces.Wat vertellen onze huidige technische architecten over deze rol?“Het werk als technische architect is heel erg uitdagend en gevarieerd. Je werkt samen met hele leuke collega’s op projecten. Op het project ben je verantwoordelijk voor de algehele kwaliteit en samenhang van het IT-landschap. Primair binnen de kaders van het project. Echter doordat je implementatie altijd samenhangt met andere systemen ben je ook veel bezig met het landschap buiten het Microsoft-project. Je bepaalt samen met de klant waar je naartoe gaat over de jaren heen en ziet jouw plannen dan werkelijkheid worden. Als je het leuk vindt is er ook altijd ruimte om op de inhoud in te gaan. Als je dat doet ben je vooral bezig met de complexe onderdelen van het project en dat is erg leuk en uitdagend.Naast de projecten houd je je bezig met de best practices van HSO. Je krijgt daardoor altijd de nieuwe ontwikkelingen mee en krijgt de kans om daar wat mee te doen.”Wat ga je doen?Als Technical Architect ben je verantwoordelijk voor het technische deel van de oplossing. Daarnaast: Ben je betrokken in de designfase en bepaal je welke technologieën gebruikt kunnen worden bij integraties, aanpassingen en/of data migraties; Daarnaast houd je je bezig met integraties met andere (third-party) applicaties, je denkt mee over integration patterns; Draag je bij aan de technische best practices van HSO en draagt deze ook uit naar de klant en het team; Fungeer je als technische vraagbaak voor de technische en functionele consultants; Zorg je voor de succesvolle uitvoering van technische oplossingen en bewaak je de naleving van projectplanningen en budgetten; Blijf je op de hoogte van de nieuwste ontwikkelingen op het Dynamics 365-platform, inclusief Dataverse, Power Platform en andere gerelateerde technologieën. Over het teamJe bent onderdeel van de Service Line Unified Operations, een onderdeel van HSO Nederland. Unified Operations is een geoliede projectservices organisatie met een uitstekende reputatie op het gebied van ERP. Samen met de andere Servicelines binnen HSO kunnen we de complete Microsoft Stack aanbieden (Modern Workplace, AI, Data & Analytics, CE, Power Platform, Azure Integrations, e.d.). Het totale team van onze Service Line bestaat momenteel uit ruim 100 professionals, onder leiding van de Service Line Director Arie Martin van den Akker. "Transformeer data als een ware meester - als senior data engineer, ben jij de alchemist die data omzet in goud!" Sta klaar om data te transformeren als een ware meester! Als Data Engineer ben jij de alchemist die data omzet in waardevolle inzichten en innovatieve oplossingen. Bij HSO krijg je de kans om te schitteren in het ontwerpen, ontwikkelen en implementeren van robuuste Data & AI oplossingen. Wat ga je doen? Als Data Engineer bij ons bedrijf ben je verantwoordelijk voor het ontwerpen, ontwikkelen en implementeren van robuuste Data & AI oplossingen. Je bent een technische expert met een scherp oog voor detail en een diepgaande kennis van Data-Engineering principes en Cloud Infrastructuren. In het Data & AI team bouw je end-to-end data-oplossingen. Dit omvat het verzamelen en opslaan van ruwe data, het implementeren van geavanceerde analytische modellen en het optimaliseren van data-architecturen voor maximale prestaties en schaalbaarheid. Daarnaast analyseer je klantbehoeften en doelstellingen om inzicht te krijgen in de gewenste dataoplossingen. Ontwikkelen en implementeren van data platformen; Samenwerken met het team en de klant om technische specificaties te definiëren en te documenteren; Ontwikkelen en implementeren van data pipelines; Optimaliseren van data-architecturen voor maximale prestaties en schaalbaarheid. Over het team In het Data & AI team werk je samen met 50 consultants die uitblinken in Data Engineering, Data Analytics, AI, Data Governance en UX. Kortom een divers team met alle mogelijkheden om te groeien en genoeg collega's die altijd voor je klaar staan. Om je kennis te verbreden zijn er maandelijkse teammeetings, expertsessies en is er alle ruimte voor het volgen van trainingen, conferenties en workshops. Daarnaast werken wij bij onze klanten veel samen in multidisciplinaire teams. Teams waarin we verschillende expertises vanuit HSO gecombineerd inzetten voor onze klanten. Denk hierbij bijvoorbeeld aan verandermanagement, User Centered Design en applicatie-integratie. We zijn op zoek naar een getalenteerde en ervaren UX/UI-Designer om ons team te versterken. Als UCD-consultant ben je verantwoordelijk voor het in kaart brengen van klant en eindgebruikers behoeften en te vertalen naar inzichtelijke procesplaten, wireframes en of prototypes. Daarbij ben je de persoon die gaat over de gebruikerservaring van onze oplossingen. Wat ga je doen? Verscheidene workshops faciliteren Het in kaart brengen van klant- en eindgebruikersbehoeften Product owners, Projectmanagers, strategisch en business consultants ondersteunen in het doorgronden van de klantvraag Het maken Gebruikersflows, informatiearchitecturen, interactiepatronen en grafisch ontwerpen Ontwerpen van interactieve elementen en definiëren van interactiepatronen om een intuïtieve gebruikerservaring te creëren Creëren van visuele ontwerpen rekening houdend met merkidentiteit en gebruikerscontext Documenteren van het UI-ontwerp, inclusief gebruikersflows, interactieontwerpen, visuele ontwerpen en andere relevante informatie om te delen met het team en belanghebbenden in design systems. Samenwerken met andere teamleden, zoals UX-designers, ontwikkelaars en productmanagers, om een samenhangende en consistente gebruikerservaring te creëren en te bewaken De verschillende digitale producten die je zult helpen ontwerpen bestaan uit: B2B- en B2C (mobiele)applicaties op het Microsoft PowerApps Platform B2B- en B2C (mobiele)applicaties op het OutSystems Platform PowerBI-rapportages en dashboards Klantportalen Infographics en One-pagers(voor o.a. presentaties) Samen met je 25 collega’s binnen de Power Platform Unit ben je dagdagelijks bezig met maatwerk cloud applicaties te ontwikkelen voor klanten. En als Technical Architect speel je daarbinnen een cruciale rol in het vormgeven van de technische architectuur. Je bent daarmee de verbindende schakel tussen de business requirements en het te automatiseren proces. Jij weet dat feilloos te vertalen naar de technische oplossing. Je treedt op als trusted advisor in langdurige klantrelaties, in projecten en in pre-sales trajecten. Je maakt daarbij gebruik van de technische stakeholders binnen HSO Cloud Services op het gebied van integraties, infrastructuur, security en modern work. Vanuit jouw rol ben je in staat om breder te kijken dan de oplossing die HSO bij de klant levert. Jij bent sparring partner voor de klant en overziet het complete (technische) speelveld. Samen met de Tech Lead draag je vanuit de Power Platform Unit de technische best practices richting klanten en (interne) collega’s uitDaarnaast: Je bent betrokken in de designfase en bepaalt welke technologieën kunnen worden gebruikt in welke scenario's. Je draagt bij aan de technische best practices van HSO en draagt deze ook uit naar de klant en het team. Je fungeert als technische vraagbaak voor de technische en functionele consultants. Daarnaast houd je je bezig met de andere technische domeinen (integraties, infrastructuur, security en modern work). Je zorgt ervoor dat alles in source control terecht komt en dat er automatisch uitgerold wordt d,m,v, Azure DevOps pipelines. Samen met de Product Owner stel je een roadmap op voor technische verbeteringen. Join us as a Senior Dynamics 365 Power Platform Developer!As a Senior Dynamics 365 Power Platform Developer, you'll chart your own career and personal growth path with the backing of our organization. Collaborating closely with clients, you'll make a tangible impact while immersing yourself in the cutting-edge world of business consultancy and process optimization, empowered by the latest Microsoft solutions.ResponsibilitiesGather requirements and design, develop, and implement Dynamics 365 power platform solutions across Sales, Customer Service, Field Service, Marketing, and Project Operations for AEC (Architecture, Engineering, Construction) and Legal industries. Deliver superior business and software application services, crafting sustainable solutions that meet clients' needs. Leverage your technical prowess in Dynamics 365 power platform Customization & Configuration. Excel in Plugins, TypeScript, Power Automate, and Power Apps to extend and enrich core functionalities.Uphold coding standards, ensuring the delivery of high-quality, maintainable, and efficient code.Analyze and troubleshoot complex issues, offering effective and timely solutions. Conduct comprehensive code reviews, providing constructive feedback, and mentoring junior developers. Meet and exceed customer expectations in terms of business knowledge, skills, and conduct, identifying and mitigating project risks as needed. Communicate project progress updates to relevant stakeholders in a clear and timely manner. Participate in pre-sales activities as needed, while also assuming Architect roles and responsibilities as required. Serve as a professional ambassador for HSO, proactively advising customers on industry best practices. Ben jij IT’er met development ervaring? Ben je benieuwd naar de wereld van low-code? Wij werken intensief samen met Microsoft en OutSystems en investeren in kennis die in de komende jaren van grote waarde is. Voor onze klanten, voor HSO en voor jouzelf!Wij helpen onze klanten met het maken van vooruitstrevende applicaties door middel van het low code platform OutSystems. Als OutSystems consultant ben je verantwoordelijk voor het ontwikkelen van applicaties binnen een goede architectuur die aansluit bij de behoefte van de klant. Daarnaast zal je overleggen met klanten om duidelijkheid over processen te krijgen en te sparren over functionaliteiten en de opleveringen van de applicatie. Je leert van en met collega’s en wordt continu intensief begeleid. Ben jij de strategische denker die organisaties naar het volgende niveau tilt met de kracht van Microsoft Power Platform?Join the journey!Als (Senior) Consultant Power Platform speel je een sleutelrol binnen het Microsoft Power Platform House van HSO: een snelgroeiende afdeling met een ondernemende mindset waarin jouw expertise noodzakelijk is om verder te kunnen groeien. Jij bent als Consultant Power Platform vanaf de salesfase betrokken om samen met het beoogde klantteam de klant op weg te helpen met onze aanpak en propositie. Jij kunt in alle vrijheid Low-code implementatietrajecten uitdenken en begeleiden. Gesteund door een ervaren en gemotiveerd team.Jij bent: Een protagonist in Low-code / No-code! In ons snelle digitale landschap maak jij je hard voor low-code / no-code Power Platform met als doel business- en IT-transformaties bij onze klanten. Efficiëntie, snelheid en autonomie. Een aanjager! Stilstaan is voor jou achteruitgaan. Je hebt een ondernemend karakter en lerend vermogen. Het is bijvoorbeeld geen probleem om vanuit een ander platform te komen. We helpen je! Een mentor! Jij bouwt op collectieve ontwikkeling en samenwerking. Met jouw sterke communicatieve vaardigheden en overtuigingskracht ben jij een mentor voor je (junior) collega’s. Jij wordt enthousiast van samenwerken binnen multidisciplinaire teams van consultants, architecten en techneuten. Een workshop superster! Jouw hart gaat sneller kloppen van het geven van technische inspirerende workshops voor klanten. Jij deelt graag jouw visie op nieuwe technologieën en de impact daarvan op het bedrijfsleven. Wat ga je doen?In kort cyclische trajecten ben jij de facilitator. Jij helpt klanten out-of-the-box denken, zelf oplossingen uit te werken en de toegankelijkheid te vergroten. De toegevoegde waarde van HSO? Wij zijn een stevige strategische business enabler door onze verdiepende en uitgebreide Microsoft Power Platform kennis. Met de programmamanager en het projectteam stel jij de daarbij horende Power Platform oplossingen op. Je hebt daarin alle ruimte om maatwerk te bieden. Hoe ziet dat er precies uit? Jij leidt technische workshops met klant- en projectteams en werkt aan vereisten voor het ontwerpen en ontwikkelen van de beste end-to-end business solutions. Je bent verantwoordelijk voor het uitrollen van de Power Platform oplossingen. Jij weet wanneer je naar de klant luistert en wanneer je kritische vragen stelt. Je ziet het klantbelang in en voelt aan wanneer onze aanpak aangepast moet worden. Met jouw ervaring en kennis ben jij de gids van de klant in het implementatieproces. Met jouw strategische en tactische manier van denken vertaal je business opportunities in toekomstige scenario’s. We bieden je autonomie maar ook ondersteuning wanneer jij dat nodig hebt. Als Senior Projectmanager balanceer je voortdurend tussen klantbelangen en HSO-doelen. Onze projecten zijn bovengemiddeld complex, met stakeholders verspreid over meerdere bedrijven en landen - maar voor jou is dit bekend terrein.TakenAls Senior Projectmanager leid je de implementatie van Microsoft technologie en stuur je het HSO projectteam aan.Werk aan complexe projecten en groei in je carrière bij één van de beste Microsoft system integrators in Nederland.We leveren oplossingen voor klanten die bewust kiezen voor het Microsoft Cloud platform, waaronder Dynamics 365 for Customer Relationship Management (CRM), Field Service en Power BI. Als één van de weinige Microsoft system integrators biedt HSO deze totaaloplossing, met uitdagende internationale projecten waarvoor we jouw expertise en ervaring nodig hebben. Beschik jij over vaardigheden om meerdere complexen tegelijkertijd te overzien, durf jij kritisch te zijn op processen en wil jij klanten helpen groeien door middel van succesvolle digitale innovatie? Dan komen wij graag in contact met jou!
